entry.title: Severe Thunderstorm Warning
entry.summary:
At 12:45 pm, MetService weather radar detected severe thunderstorms near TIMARU, ST ANDREWS, PAREORA, MAKIKIHI and OFFSHORE EAST OF TIMARU.
These severe thunderstorms are moving towards the northnortheast, and are expected to lie near TIMARU, ST ANDREWS, PAREORA, OFFSHORE EAST OF TIMARU and HADLOW at 01:15 pm and near TIMARU, TEMUKA, OFFSHORE EAST OF TIMARU, LEVELS, HADLOW and WASHDYKE at 01:45 pm.
These thunderstorms are expected to be accompanied by very heavy rain and large hail.
Impact:
Very heavy rain can cause surface and/or flash flooding about streams, gullies and urban areas, and make driving conditions extremely hazardous.
Large hail can cause significant damage to crops, orchards, vines, glasshouses and vehicles, and make driving conditions hazardous.
